39 // Class HeightFieldShape
50 class HeightFieldShape : public ConcaveShape {
51 
52  public:
53 
55  enum class HeightDataType {HEIGHT_FLOAT_TYPE, HEIGHT_DOUBLE_TYPE, HEIGHT_INT_TYPE};
56 
57  protected:
58 
59  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
60 
62  int mNbColumns;
63 
65  int mNbRows;
66 
68  decimal mWidth;
69 
71  decimal mLength;
72 
74  decimal mMinHeight;
75 
77  decimal mMaxHeight;
78 
80  int mUpAxis;
81 
83  decimal mIntegerHeightScale;
84 
86  HeightDataType mHeightDataType;
87 
89  const void* mHeightFieldData;
90 
92  AABB mAABB;
93 
95  HalfEdgeStructure& mTriangleHalfEdgeStructure;
96 
97  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
98 
100  HeightFieldShape(int nbGridColumns, int nbGridRows, decimal minHeight, decimal maxHeight,
101  const void* heightFieldData, HeightDataType dataType, MemoryAllocator& allocator,
102  HalfEdgeStructure& triangleHalfEdgeStructure, int upAxis = 1, decimal integerHeightScale = 1.0f,
103  const Vector3& scaling = Vector3(1,1,1));
104 
106  bool raycastTriangle(const Ray& ray, const Vector3& p1, const Vector3& p2, const Vector3& p3, uint32 shapeId,
107  Collider *collider, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, decimal &smallestHitFraction, MemoryAllocator& allocator) const;
108 
110  virtual bool raycast(const Ray& ray, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, Collider* collider, MemoryAllocator& allocator) const override;
111 
113  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const override;
114 
117  void getTriangleVerticesWithIndexPointer(int32 subPart, int32 triangleIndex,
118  Vector3* outTriangleVertices) const;

122

125

160  Array<Vector3>& triangleVerticesNormals, Array<uint32>& shapeIds,
161  MemoryAllocator& allocator) const override;
162 
164  virtual std::string to_string() const override;
165 
166  // ---------- Friendship ----------- //
167

170  friend class PhysicsCommon;
171 };
172 
173 // Return the number of rows in the height field
174 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE int HeightFieldShape::getNbRows() const {
175  return mNbRows;
176 }
177 
178 // Return the number of columns in the height field
179 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE int HeightFieldShape::getNbColumns() const {
180  return mNbColumns;
181 }
182 
183 // Return the type of height value in the height field
184 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE HeightFieldShape::HeightDataType HeightFieldShape::getHeightDataType() const {
185  return mHeightDataType;
186 }
187 
188 // Return the number of bytes used by the collision shape
189 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE size_t HeightFieldShape::getSizeInBytes() const {
190  return sizeof(HeightFieldShape);
191 }
192 
193 // Return the height of a given (x,y) point in the height field
194 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal HeightFieldShape::getHeightAt(int x, int y) const {
195 
196  assert(x >= 0 && x < mNbColumns);
197  assert(y >= 0 && y < mNbRows);
198 
199  switch(mHeightDataType) {
200  case HeightDataType::HEIGHT_FLOAT_TYPE : return decimal(((float*)mHeightFieldData)[y * mNbColumns + x]);
201  case HeightDataType::HEIGHT_DOUBLE_TYPE : return decimal(((double*)mHeightFieldData)[y * mNbColumns + x]);
202  case HeightDataType::HEIGHT_INT_TYPE : return decimal(((int*)mHeightFieldData)[y * mNbColumns + x] * mIntegerHeightScale);
203  default: assert(false); return 0;
204  }
205 }
206 
207 // Compute the shape Id for a given triangle
208 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 HeightFieldShape::computeTriangleShapeId(uint32 iIndex, uint32 jIndex, uint32 secondTriangleIncrement) const {
209 
210  return (jIndex * (mNbColumns - 1) + iIndex) * 2 + secondTriangleIncrement;
211 }
212 
213 }
214 #endif
